'''1.1.2''' is a minor update for ''[[Pocket Edition]]'' and [[:Category:Bedrock_Edition|its derived editions]]<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360004168651|title=MCPE/WIN10/GEAR VR - 1.1.2}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Fixes ==
* Various improvements and fixes.
* Fixed a glitch in villager trading.
* Fixed a glitch where baby villagers were not able to fit in 1&times;1 gaps.
